name: ChoiceCard
purpose: Present a short set of options as selectable cards to support comparison and deliberate decision-making.
useWhen: User must choose from a small number of meaningful options
Selection represents a configuration or mode choice
rules: Options are presented as visually consistent cards
All options have equal visual weight
Selection control (radio, switch, checkbox) is integrated into the card
doNotUseWhen: Options are numerous (use Select or Combobox)
aiHints: Use ChoiceCard when comparison and clarity matter more than compactness
Do not mix ChoiceCard with plain radio lists in the same decision set
Avoid nesting ChoiceCards inside other cards
